verses.verse: Now <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> was toward <S%H53>Absalom.<s%>

<S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H8620>Tekoa,<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> there a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H802>woman,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H56>her,<s%> "Please act like a mourner, and put <S%H3847>on<s%> <S%H60>mourning<s%> <S%H899>clothing,<s%> <S%H5480>please,<s%> and don't anoint yourself with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> but be as a <S%H802>woman<s%> who has <S%H56>mourned<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead.<s%>
<S%H935>Go<s%> in to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> like <S%H1697>this<s%> to <S%H3097>him.<s%>" So Joab <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> in her <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

When the <S%H802>woman<s%> of <S%H8621>Tekoa<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> she <S%H5307>fell<s%> on her <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> showed <S%H7812>respect,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3467>"Help,<s%> O <S%H4428>king!<s%>"
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>her,<s%> "What ails you?" She answered, <S%H61>"Truly<s%> <S%H802>I<s%> am a <S%H490>widow,<s%> and my <S%H376>husband<s%> is <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

Your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and they <S%H8147>both<s%> fought <S%H5327>together<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and there was no one to <S%H5337>part<s%> <S%H259>them,<s%> but the one <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H259>other,<s%> and killed <S%H5221>him.<s%>

<S%H4940>Behold,<s%> the whole family has <S%H6965>risen<s%> against your <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> and they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5414><s%> 'Deliver him who <S%H5221>struck<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> that we may <S%H4191>kill<s%> him for the <S%H5315>life<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> whom he <S%H2026>killed,<s%> and so <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H3423>heir<s%> <S%H3518>also.<s%>' Thus they would quench my <S%H1513>coal<s%> which is <S%H7760>left,<s%> and would <S%H7760>leave<s%> to my <S%H376>husband<s%> neither <S%H8034>name<s%> nor <S%H7611>remainder<s%> <S%H6440>on<s%> the surface of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>"
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go<s%> to your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and I will give a command concerning <S%H6680>you.<s%>"

The <S%H802>woman<s%> of <S%H8621>Tekoa<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "My <S%H113>lord,<s%> O <S%H4428>king,<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> be on <S%H1>me,<s%> and on my father's <S%H1004>house;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H3678>throne<s%> be <S%H5355>guiltless.<s%>"
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Whoever <S%H559>says<s%> anything to <S%H935>you,<s%> bring him to <S%H5060>me,<s%> and he shall not touch you any <S%H3254>more.<s%>"

Then she <S%H559>said,<s%> "Please let the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> that the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7843>destroy<s%> not any <S%H7235>more,<s%> lest they <S%H8045>destroy<s%> my <S%H1121>son.<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> not one <S%H8185>hair<s%> of your <S%H1121>son<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

Then the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Please let your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> to my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Say <S%H1696>on.<s%>"

The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Why then have you <S%H2803>devised<s%> such a thing against the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H430>God?<s%> For in <S%H1696>speaking<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> is as one who is <S%H818>guilty,<s%> in that the <S%H4428>king<s%> does not bring home <S%H7725>again<s%> his banished <S%H5080>one.<s%>

For we <S%H4191>must<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> and are as <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H5064>spilled<s%> on the <S%H776>ground,<s%> which <S%H622>can't<s%> be gathered up again; neither does <S%H430>God<s%> take <S%H5375>away<s%> <S%H5315>life,<s%> but <S%H2803>devises<s%> <S%H4284>means,<s%> that he who is <S%H5080>banished<s%> not be an outcast from <S%H5080>him.<s%>

Now therefore seeing that I have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%> to my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> it is because the <S%H5971>people<s%> have made me <S%H3372>afraid:<s%> and your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1696><s%> 'I will now speak to the <S%H4428>king;<s%> it may be that the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H6213>perform<s%> the <S%H1697>request<s%> of his <S%H519>servant.<s%>'

For the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H8085>hear,<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H519>servant<s%> out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> who would <S%H8045>destroy<s%> me and my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> out of the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

Then your <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> 'Please let the word of my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> bring <S%H4496>rest;<s%> for as an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> so is my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H8085>discern<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>bad.<s%> May <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> be with you.'"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> "Please <S%H3582>don't<s%> hide <S%H1697>anything<s%> from me that I <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H802>you.<s%>" The woman <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> now <S%H1696>speak.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> with you in all <S%H802>this?<s%>" The woman <S%H6030>answered,<s%> "As your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> no <S%H5315>one<s%> <S%H786>can<s%> turn to the right <S%H3231>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8041>left<s%> from anything that my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken;<s%> for your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> he <S%H6680>urged<s%> <S%H7760>me,<s%> and he put all these <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of your <S%H8198>handmaid;<s%>

<S%H5668>to<s%> <S%H5437>change<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H1697>matter<s%> has your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing.<s%> My <S%H113>lord<s%> is <S%H2450>wise,<s%> according to the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of an <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> all things that are in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> "Behold <S%H6213>now,<s%> I have done this <S%H1697>thing.<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> <S%H7725>therefore,<s%> bring the young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7725>back.<s%>"

<S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> on his <S%H6440>face,<s%> showed <S%H7812>respect,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3117>"Today<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> that I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H4428>king,<s%> in that the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H6213>performed<s%> the <S%H1697>request<s%> of his <S%H5650>servant.<s%>"
So <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1650>Geshur,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let him <S%H5437>return<s%> to his own <S%H1004>house,<s%> but let him not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face.<s%>" So <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H5437>returned<s%> to his own <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H7200>didn't<s%> see the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6440>face.<s%>

Now in all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> there was <S%H376>none<s%> to be so <S%H3966>much<s%> <S%H1984>praised<s%> as <S%H53>Absalom<s%> for his <S%H3303>beauty:<s%> from the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of his <S%H7272>foot<s%> even to the crown of his <S%H6936>head<s%> there was no blemish in <S%H3971>him.<s%>

When he <S%H1548>cut<s%> the hair of his <S%H7218>head<s%> (now it was at every <S%H3117>year<s%>'s <S%H7093>end<s%> that he <S%H1548>cut<s%> <S%H3513>it;<s%> because it was heavy on <S%H1548>him,<s%> therefore he cut <S%H8254>it<s%>); he weighed the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> at two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H68>weight.<s%>

To <S%H53>Absalom<s%> there were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H8559>Tamar:<s%> she was a <S%H802>woman<s%> of a <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> <S%H4758>face.<s%>
<S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> two <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and he <S%H7200>didn't<s%> see the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6440>face.<s%>

Then <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> for <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> to <S%H7971>send<s%> him to the <S%H4428>king;<s%> but he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7971>him:<s%> and he sent again a second <S%H8145>time,<s%> but he <S%H14>would<s%> not <S%H935>come.<s%>

Therefore he <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%>'s <S%H2513>field<s%> is <S%H413>near<s%> <S%H3027>mine,<s%> and he has <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H3212>there.<s%> Go and <S%H3341>set<s%> it on <S%H784>fire.<s%>" <S%H53>Absalom<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H3341>set<s%> the <S%H2513>field<s%> on <S%H784>fire.<s%>

Then <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H53>Absalom<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5650>him,<s%> "Why have your servants <S%H3341>set<s%> my <S%H2513>field<s%> on <S%H784>fire?<s%>"

<S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> <S%H7971>"Behold,<s%> I sent to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H935><s%> 'Come <S%H7971>here,<s%> that I may send you to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> to <S%H559>say,<s%> "Why have I <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H1650>Geshur?<s%> It would be <S%H2896>better<s%> for me to be there <S%H7200>still.<s%> Now therefore let me see the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H6440>face;<s%> and if there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> in <S%H4191>me,<s%> let him kill me."'"

So <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7121>him;<s%> and when he had called for <S%H53>Absalom,<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself on his <S%H639>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king:<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5401>kissed<s%> <S%H53>Absalom.<s%>
